title: Did Pelosi Issue a Statement Calling Kevin McCarthy ‘Q-CA’?
subtitle: A news release issued by House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's office contained a dig at Kevin McCarthy.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's office published a news release referring to House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy's political affiliation as "Q-CA" in reference to the QAnon conspiracy movement.
